name: U.A. Libero Spiker
desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by returning 1 "U.A." monster you control to the hand, except "U.A. Libero Spiker". You can only Special Summon "U.A. Libero Spiker" once per turn this way. During your opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 Level 5 or higher "U.A." monster from your hand into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "U.A." monster from your Deck with a different name, then return this card to the hand. You can only use this effect of "U.A. Libero Spiker" once per turn.
